channel.title: SeaChat Integrations on
channel.description: Recent content in SeaChat Integrations on

item.title: Shopify
item.description: Go to your Shopify dashboard and click on Online Store from the menu. Start editing by clicking the ellipsis icon next to your current theme and choosing Edit code. Click on “theme.liquid” on the left side panel. Paste the SeaChat code snippet in the <head> section. You can paste it anywhere between the opening <head> tag and the closing </head> tag. Click “Save” button on top right.

item.title: Squarespace
item.description: Go to your Squarespace dashboard for the website of interest. Select the “Website” on the sidebar menu. Next, select “Website Tools” in the sidebar menu. Select “Code Injection” in the sidebar menu. Paste the SeaChat code snippet in the HEADER text box. Remember to click “SAVE”. Use “Preview” function on Squarespace to test the AI agent. Remember to launch the store again when you are ready!
